publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3500 Karen Whitefield: National Youth Work Week—That the Parliament recognises the importance of national Youth Work Week from 1 to 7 November 2005; congratulates YouthLink Scotland on organising a national event and local activities to raise awareness about, and to celebrate, Youth Work Week; recognises the significant contribution which projects such as Route 98 and YouthBank have made to developing new work practices in relation to training and youth empowerment; further recognises the positive contribution that the youth work sector makes to the lives of thousands of young people across Scotland, and welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment in A Partnership for a Better Scotland to developing a national strategy for youth work.
S2M-3500 National Youth Work Week (lodged on 1 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3500 National Youth Work Week (lodged on 1 November 2005) Patrick Harvie*

S2M-3500 Karen Whitefield: National Youth Work Week—That the Parliament recognises the importance of national Youth Work Week from 1 to 7 November 2005; congratulates YouthLink Scotland on organising a national event and local activities to raise awareness about, and to celebrate, Youth Work Week; recognises the significant contribution which projects such as Route 98 and YouthBank have made to developing new work practices in relation to training and youth empowerment; further recognises the positive contribution that the youth work sector makes to the lives of thousands of young people across Scotland, and welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment in A Partnership for a Better Scotland to developing a national strategy for youth work.Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Patrick Harvie
S2M-3500 National Youth Work Week (lodged on 1 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3500 National Youth Work Week (lodged on 1 November 2005) Shiona Baird*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3500 National Youth Work Week (lodged on 1 November 2005) Michael McMahon*
